marketing_text_raw: From the main distribution panel it isolates your sensitive downline equipment from nearby switching motor loads and in-house surges.
It preserves your assets and maximizes your long-term profits!
overview.system_description_raw: The Mach 6 SPD System is a primary level of multi-element surge protection to be located at the service entrance.

raw_bullets: Your most vital primary level defense against today’s rolling blackouts and brownouts!
Designed for easy mounting and installation for fast response-time protection.
Integral grid of primary & secondary levels of non-degrading SPD technology provides long-term 24/7 AC power system integrity.

safety_and_compliance.safety_statement_raw: Safety rated as SPD Type 1 & Type 2 with the TVSS industry’s highest safety SCCR rating of 200kAIC
safety_and_compliance.overcurrent_protection_raw: Type 1 & Type 2, use breaker per CODE RULE 26-420

monitoring_and_status.status_indicators_raw: Lifetime Green LED Self Test Protection Status Monitors for Each Phase

source_metadata.notes: All numeric and descriptive values copied directly from the final column; no normalization performed
